data.text: @angrybklynmom @CDCgov They don't normally reply to me, so it was very exciting to actually hear back today! 🤣

@angrybklynmom @CDCgov FYI... I'm not sure if you contacted CDC about this, but I did, and I actually got a reply today. Maybe the words "horrifically wrong" got their attention. 😂 I also archived the page so we have history if they update it. https://t.co/qrPOLZIp1f https://t.co/VWgq605qOj
@sagusta9 @KelleyKga @Stumpfworld @angrybklynmom @CDCgov This is not anything from the CDC
@angrybklynmom @DrJBhattacharya @CDCgov You expect truth from the CDC? I have a bridge in Brooklyn for sale.😂😂😂😂
@dabossyho @angrybklynmom @CDCgov I'm sure it's Common Core math.

@sagusta9 @Stumpfworld @angrybklynmom @CDCgov I actually thought we were at the point where both sides were realizing the CDC is full of it. Some of us just knew they have been wrong from the start! I agree - this would be a great real-life math problem for him and a good life lesson that experts are fallible.

@KelleyKga @Stumpfworld @angrybklynmom @CDCgov … he & 1 other only kids Unmasked outside today at recess. (1/3 of kids have had covid). I’m just so frustrated but, @KelleyKga, will show my son this data. He can do this math in 5th grade! Actually I’ll just give him the raw data & have him calculate %’s then show CDC slide!
